title: Emotional Rebekah Vardy arrives home amid Coleen Rooney bombshell row
text:
Rebekah Vardy has arrived home to the UK sobbing her eyes out (Picture: Getty)

Rebekah Vardy has arrived home to the UK sobbing her eyes out after being accused by Coleen Rooney of selling stories to the newspapers.

Rebekah was on holiday in Dubai when Coleen made her bombshell accusations on Wednesday, writing on Instagram that she had suspected the WAG of selling stories and so set up an elaborate sting to expose Rebekah.

On Saturday she was pictured arriving at Heathrow Airport clearly overcome with emotion and in pictures obtained by The Sun could be seen holding her hands over her face as tears fell.

The heavily pregnant 37-year-old was holding husband Jamie Vardy’s hand as she walked through the airport to her car.

Covering her face at points to hide her tears, the star was dressed down in casual joggers and a sweater.

Rebekah has denied all the allegations (Picture: Getty Images)

Rebekah has denied all the allegations and has called on lawyers to find out who had access to her Instagram and when.

The WAG achieved further fame in 2017 when she appeared on I’m A Celebrity… Get Me Out Of Here! and she and Coleen became pals as their husbands played alongside each other for England.

WAGs Coleen and Rebekah crossed paths at football matches when their husbands were playing (Picture: Shutterstock)

However, it is thought they are now only speaking through lawyers after Coleen sent shockwaves through the media when she alleged Rebekah had been selling fake stories about the Rooneys to newspapers.

Coleen wrote that she had set up a sting in order to discover who was selling the stories about her and the Rooney family by setting up fake stories and only giving access to her stories to one person – Rebekah.

Colleen Rooney accused Rebekah Vardy of selling stories to the press (Instagram)

‘It’s been tough keeping it to myself and not making any comment at all, especially when the stories have been leaked, however, I had to,’ she wrote.

‘Now I know for certain which account/individual it’s come from.

‘I have saved and screenshotted all the original stories which clearly show just one person has viewed them. It’s…… Rebekah Vardy’s account.’

Sources close to Becky have claimed that she is so sure of her innocence that she is ‘prepared to see Coleen in court if necessary’.

‘If Becky needs to prove to Coleen and the world that she hasn’t done anything wrong then she is prepared to see Coleen in court if necessary,’ the insider told The Sun.
